alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 22 at 5:57PM MDT until August 22 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 557 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sand Hollow State Park, or 24 miles northeast of Virgin River Gorge, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Washington, Hurricane, La Verkin, Sand Hollow State Park, Quail Creek State Park, Toquerville, Leeds and Virgin. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 12 and 24. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
